results.title: Devilman Crybaby
results.creator_credit: Go Nagai, Eunyoung Choi, Yohei Shintaku, Dynamic Planning and Science SARU
results.brief_description: Akira Fudo learns from his best friend Ryo Asuka that demons will revive and reclaim the world from humans. With humans hopeless against this threat, Ryo suggests combining with a demon. With this, Akira becomes Devilman, a being with the power of demon but with a human heart.

constellations_primary.name: Evangelical animation
constellations_primary.description: This Constellation exploring animation was created by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Melanie Kavanagh.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Go Nagai, Eunyoung Choi, Yohei Shintaku, Dynamic Planning and Science SARU
results.description: Akira Fudo learns from his best friend Ryo Asuka that demons will revive and reclaim the world from humans. With humans hopeless against this threat, Ryo suggests combining with a demon. With this, Akira becomes Devilman, a being with the power of demon but with a human heart.
description_for_label: Akira Fudo learns from his best friend Ryo Asuka that demons will revive and reclaim the world from humans. With humans hopeless against this threat, Ryo suggests combining with a demon. With this, Akira becomes Devilman, a being with the power of demon but with a human heart.

results.title: Devil and the Deep
results.creator_credit: Harry Hervey, Marion Gering, Travis Banton, Benn W. Levy and Paramount
results.brief_description: Naval commander Charles Storm has made life miserable for his wife Diana due to his insane jealousy over every man she speaks to. His obsessive behavior soon drives her to the arms of a handsome lieutenant. When Charles learns of their affair, he plots revenge.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Harry Hervey, Marion Gering, Travis Banton, Benn W. Levy and Paramount
results.description: Naval commander Charles Storm has made life miserable for his wife Diana due to his insane jealousy over every man she speaks to. His obsessive behavior soon drives her to the arms of a handsome lieutenant. When Charles learns of their affair, he plots revenge.
description_for_label: Naval commander Charles Storm has made life miserable for his wife Diana due to his insane jealousy over every man she speaks to. His obsessive behavior soon drives her to the arms of a handsome lieutenant. When Charles learns of their affair, he plots revenge.

results.title: Destroyer
results.brief_description: Erin Bell is an LAPD detective who was placed undercover with a Californian gang with tragic results. When the leader re-emerges years later, she must work her way back into her own history to finally reckon with the demons that destroyed her past.

constellations_other.name: 1960s television
constellations_other.description: After its debut in the fifties, Australians rapidly became enthusiastic television viewers in the sixties as American imports started to be mixed with notable local productions.

results.description: Erin Bell is an LAPD detective who, as a young cop, was placed undercover with a gang in the California desert with tragic results. When the leader of that gang re-emerges many years later, she must work her way back through the remaining members and into her own history with them to finally reckon with the demons that destroyed her past.
description_for_label: Erin Bell is an LAPD detective who, as a young cop, was placed undercover with a gang in the California desert with tragic results. When the leader of that gang re-emerges many years later, she must work her way back through the remaining members and into her own history with them to finally reckon with the demons that destroyed her past.

results.title: Destiny in Alice
results.brief_description: In the Heart of Australia, one of the harshest places on the planet, the town of Alice Springs has become a haven for lesbians, confronting the challenges of loving across racial and cultural gaps.

constellations_other.name: Broadcasting marginal voices
constellations_other.description: The creation of Indigenous broadcasting in Central Australia from the late 1970s meant an array of diverse Black stories could be shared. Today, important stories told by those who physically and metaphorically live on the margins can be broadcast widely.

results.description: In the Heart of Australia, one of the harshest places on the planet, the town of Alice Springs has become a haven for lesbians, confronting the challenges of loving across racial and cultural gaps.
description_for_label: In the Heart of Australia, one of the harshest places on the planet, the town of Alice Springs has become a haven for lesbians, confronting the challenges of loving across racial and cultural gaps.

results.title: Death Defying Acts
results.brief_description: On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con the famous magician.
results.description: On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con the famous magician.
description_for_label: On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con the famous magician.

results.title: Dead Set
results.creator_credit: Rebecca Hale, Yann Demange, Channel 4 Television and Zeppotron
results.brief_description: Zombies are rampaging throughout Britain. Blissfully unaware of gory events outside, the Big Brother housemates are in for the ultimate eviction night…

constellations_other.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_other.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Rebecca Hale, Yann Demange, Channel 4 Television and Zeppotron
results.description: Zombies are rampaging throughout Britain. Blissfully unaware of gory events outside, the Big Brother housemates are in for the ultimate eviction night…

results.title: Dead of Night
results.creator_credit: Bianca Mosca, T.E.B. Clarke and Marion Horn
results.brief_description: A British horror anthology made during the Second World War, Dead of Night is mostly remembered for the final story about an amoral and malevolent ventriloquist’s dummy, Hugo.

constellations_other.name: Like a puppet on a string
constellations_other.description: From the silly to the sinister, puppets, muppets, dummies and toys on-screen.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Bianca Mosca, T.E.B. Clarke and Marion Horn
results.description: Architect Walter Craig, seeking the possibility of some work at a country farmhouse, soon finds himself once again stuck in his recurring nightmare. Dreading the end of the dream that he knows is coming, he must first listen to all the assembled guests’ own bizarre tales.
description_for_label: Architect Walter Craig, seeking the possibility of some work at a country farmhouse, soon finds himself once again stuck in his recurring nightmare. Dreading the end of the dream that he knows is coming, he must first listen to all the assembled guests’ own bizarre tales.

results.title: Dayveon
results.creator_credit: Steven Reneau, Tiffany Barry, Amman Abbasi, Salem Street Entertainment, Rough House Pictures, Muskat Filmed Properties, Meridian Entertainment, Mama Bear Studios, Alexander Uhlmann, Lachion Buckingham and Symbolic Exchange
results.brief_description: In the wake of his big brother’s violent death, 13-year-old Dayveon struggles to find his way in an economically depressed Arkansas town. With no parents and few role models around, Dayveon is soon torn between the lure of a local gang and the friendship of his sister’s boyfriend.

constellations_other.name: Warwick Thornton
constellations_other.description: Brimming with Shakespearean undertones and pathos, Kaytetye filmmaker Warwick Thornton's debut feature Samson and Delilah is both a universal tale and one intrinsically tied to the experience of First Peoples in Central Australia.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Steven Reneau, Tiffany Barry, Amman Abbasi, Salem Street Entertainment, Rough House Pictures, Muskat Filmed Properties, Meridian Entertainment, Mama Bear Studios, Alexander Uhlmann, Lachion Buckingham and Symbolic Exchange
results.description: In the wake of his big brother’s violent death, 13-year-old Dayveon struggles to find his way in an economically depressed Arkansas town. With no parents and few role models around, Dayveon is soon torn between the lure of a local gang and the friendship of his sister’s boyfriend.

results.title: Dawson's Creek
results.creator_credit: Sony Pictures Television Studios, Outerbanks Entertainment, Columbia TriStar Television, Granville Productions, Procter & Gamble Productions (PGP), Paul Stupin, Tom Kapinos and Kevin Williamson
results.brief_description: Dawson’s Creek is an American teen drama that portrays the fictional lives of a close-knit group of teenagers through high school and college.

constellations_other.name: Amateur hour
constellations_other.description: Early sound equipment allowed filmmakers and amateurs alike the ability to experiment often with affordable 16mm film.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Sony Pictures Television Studios, Outerbanks Entertainment, Columbia TriStar Television, Granville Productions, Procter & Gamble Productions (PGP), Paul Stupin, Tom Kapinos and Kevin Williamson
results.description: Dawson’s Creek is an American teen drama that portrays the fictional lives of a close-knit group of teenagers through high school and college.
description_for_label: Dawson’s Creek is an American teen drama that portrays the fictional lives of a close-knit group of teenagers through high school and college.

results.title: Daria in 'Is It Fall Yet?'
results.brief_description: Daria is a 16-year-old girl who is a little too smart and funny to fit in with the crowd. It’s summertime and the livin’ is hard. Daria finds herself forced into volunteering at the OK To Cry Corral, a summer camp for the overly sensitive and those who’d like to be.
